abstract: Jean King talks about her experiences as a wife of a navy salvage diver during World War II
description: I have vivid memories of watching the Army march along Swanston Street, fit and tanned with heads held high, wearing the famous slouch hat. Jean King's husband was a navy salvage diver during World War II, and she shares her experiences of being the wife of a war veteran as well as the toll the war took on families and the returned after the war
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2001753; In our words: stories from Victorian veterans [June 2009]; Active; 2009
